updates.content:
We got reports about problems while saving alt/title in Media area, SEO settings, roles, build triggers and webhooks.

This does not affect our REST API.

We are working on a fix
A fix for the previous problems has been deployed. We are working on another problem regarding records version history.
Even the last bug on records version history has been resolved. We are now monitoring.

name: Problems while saving some type of resources in Admin interface
